rule: All products must display a name, price, and image on listing and detail pages.
If a product is on sale, both original and discounted prices must be shown.
Product detail page must include available variants such as size, color, or scent if applicable.
Users cannot add out-of-stock products to the cart.
The cart must persist items until the user removes them or checks out.
Users can sort products on category pages by date, price, or rating.
Product rating and reviews should only appear on the product detail page.
Clicking on any product card should navigate to the product detail page.
Users can access the cart and account links at all times from the top navigation.
Checkout must require mandatory billing and shipping information.
Guest checkout is available only when there are items in the cart.
Users must accept the terms and conditions before confirming their order.
Product listings must support pagination when items exceed a single page.
All required form fields must be validated on the client side before submission.
After login, users are redirected to the My Account dashboard.
All account features (e.g., Manage Address Book, Order history, Downloads,Transaction history, Change password, Edit account details) must be accessible from My Account dashboard.
Search must return products that match the entered keyword in title or description.
Only registered users may view order history or modify personal details.
Items added to cart by guests are not persisted after logout or session timeout.
Registered users should have the ability to update or add new addresses.
Each product must have a unique identifier (product_id or SKU).
Clicking on brand logos should filter products by that brand.
